mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnABoard ( category, title, content , member_userId ) VALUES (#{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId} );
mapper.select: SELECT q.qnaId, q.category, q.title, q.content, q.status, m.userId, m.nickName FROM QnABoard q LEFT JOIN member m ON q.member_userId = m.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY qnaId DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QnABoard q LEFT JOIN member m ON q.member_userId = m.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId}
SELECT qnaId, category, title, content, status, member_userId, member_nickName FROM QnABoard WHERE member_userId = #{userId} ORDER BY qnaId DESC

SELECT q.qnaId, q.category, q.title, q.content, q.status, q.insertDatetime, m.userId, r.qnaReplyId FROM QnABoard q LEFT JOIN member m ON q.member_userId = m.userId LEFT JOIN QnAReply r ON q.member_userId = r.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} AND q.qnaId = #{qnaId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QnABoardLike WHERE qnaId = #{qnaId} AND userId = #{loggedinId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM QnABoardLike WHERE qnaId = #{qnaId} AND userId = #{loggedinId}
